package.name: Offerchat_Free_Live_Chat
package.summary: Offerchat free live chat software for Magento.
package.description:
Description

Offerchat is a free live chat program from www.offerchat.com. This is the Official Magento Extension which will install the widget into your site. Simply enter your API Key after signing up for a free account with Offerchat.

Chat Program Features

  • Full-featured chat tool
  • Unlimited chats
  • Unlimited websites
  • Visitors and agent reports
  • Customizable
  • Statistically proven to increase conversion rates
  • 100% FREE Live Chat Software

How It Works

  • Sign up for a free account with www.Offerchat.com
  • Login to your Offerchat dashboard
  • Select Widget Settings on the left
  • Select Install Widget on the top
  • Copy your API Key
  • Install this Magento extension
  • Paste the API Key under SaveTheMage>Offerchat Free Live Chat>Settings
  • Go to your chat dashboard on offerchat.com and start chatting.

Is Offerchat really free?

Yes, it is. They won't even ask for your credit card.

Why is Offerchat free?

Offerchat is 100% free because their revenue model is solely based on offering live chat outsourcing services. If you want to outsource your chat then hopefully you choose them. Otherwise its free to use

Extensions Include:

- Free updates for life
- Free installation (paid extensions only)
- 24/7 Email and toll-free support
